name: Drunk Knight
description:
Brandon, a drunkard, drinks too much only to realise that his younger sister, Leia, is nowhere to be seen. Follow Brandon in his adventure with turrets, lava and jump pads in the quest to rescue his sister.

Art, Story and Music - simonknowsstuff

NOTE: It is recommended to download the game for better lighting effects.

The game was made for the GMTK Game Jam 2020
